Review_text: i really love to use this product but today i got received with almost deforme product which almost ruin my hope even the delivery guy took rupees 10 as compulsory charge even if i tell him i buy prepaid. i suggest to  buy offline because of  such ignorance in handling product and behaviour of delivery guy.

I've been using these kind of brushes for about 8 years now. They used to be very expensive at first, but now with all the buy 2 get 2 offers, the price has halved. They made the other Pack of 2 (total 8 brushes) out of stock, so I bought this. They didn't have a good deal so I spent Rs 150. (meh,  not happy about that). Try to buy the other pack with 8 brushes in total.Hope this review is helpful.
It does not indicate whether the brush is for a man or a child actually this brush is helpfull for children...
It is indeed soft. Longevity need to test.
I ordered after seeing the reviews. It look like a baby brush. Bristles coming out even after 1st use
Worst brush I ever used in my life..I used it today for the first time and half of the bristle came out.please do not buy it .infact I want my money back ..my mouth doesn't even feel like I brushed..

The quality of the brush they supply is deteriorating..... Previously it used to be so good.... Now a days, softness of bristles lasts for maximum a week... Then they become so hard that the brush starts to hurt teeth....
Recieved a different product.Couldn't return as the item was in non refundable category.However recieved the refund.
